description: Concepts of organic chemistry and biochemistry basic to the understanding of the fundamental processes of living organisms. Fundamentals of nomenclature and the physical, chemical and biological activities of functional organic groups, structural and functional relationships of the major biomolecules, interrelationships of the various metabolic pathways and basics of molecular biology will be included.
name: AN INTRODUCTION TO ORGANIC CHEMISTRY, BIOCHEMISTRY, AND MOLECULAR GENETICS

values.name: AN INTRODUCTION TO ORGANIC CHEMISTRY, BIOCHEMISTRY, AND MOLECULAR GENETICS
